revised_title: Infra-red Spectra and State of Aggregation: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This study examines the changes in infra-red spectra of various substances, including hydrocarbons and their derivatives, when transitioning from a solid to a liquid state. The research explores the complex factors affecting these alterations, such as changes in molecular vibration frequencies and intermolecular forces. The findings contribute to a better understanding of the structure and properties of condensed phases.
